title: searching for a music arranger for a bigband/brass band type
snippet:
I need a music arranger ...I have about 30 pieces of music which I will foward to the music arranger to arrange for a band similar to a big band/brass band..which includes a violin

I need the parts to be arranged as following:

1. Replace melody with new part (so when there is vocals going on there is no melody, but the musicians plays THE new arrangament) P.S during solo parts melody can be played
2. Add dynamic markings as needed
3. Prepare score for playing (including extraction of parts in pdf format)

the arangament must then be fowarded to me as a midi file, hence to transpose to meet the vocaal range. An example of the pre-work is here attached as a midi file
